title: Game just dropped?
body:
I was in the middle of a game and I get the "attempting to reconnect"  i wait a minute or so.

I decide to exit game than reconnect, only it goes back to the client...with no reconnect option.

What does this mean?

replies.body: Been seeing a few reports on this, and it's already being investigated.  Your issue sounds like a disappearing game, so it might act as if it never existed.  I don't have any other details to share right now, but it's being looked into!
You should disable ranked immediately, people are losing LP

> Been seeing a few reports on this, and it's already being investigated.  Your issue sounds like a disappearing game, so it might act as if it never existed.  I don't have any other details to share right now, but it's being looked into!

The whole banned message after exiting for a legit reason needs to be looked into. xD

Looks like it's happening to a lot of us, OP.GG shows the game is still going on yet restarting the client gives no option to Reconnect.  Changing the game settings for Windowed Mode doesn't seem to remedy the issue either, so I'm not sure how to workaround it.
